remarks: The multiplication operation of a commutative ring is commutative. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 8-Jun-2010.)
statement:
crngocom.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
crngocom.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
crngocom.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
crngocom $p |- ( ( R e. CRingOps /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A H B ) = ( B H A ) ) $.
